publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1673 Patricia Ferguson: Congratulations to Allied Vehicles Ltd—That the Parliament notes that Allied Vehicles Ltd is the United Kingdom’s leading manufacturer of wheelchair accessible cars, taxis and minibuses and has recently been recognised for its achievements in both the Glasgow Business Awards and the Scottish Enterprise Glasgow Awards; congratulates Michael and Gerry Facenna and their company for their commitment to the Possilpark area of Glasgow, and congratulates the company on its recent acquisition of land to allow it to build a new factory in the area, from which it has recruited 85% of its workforce.
S3M-1673 Congratulations to Allied Vehicles Ltd (lodged on 4 April 2008) Bob Doris*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-1673 Congratulations to Allied Vehicles Ltd (lodged on 4 April 2008) Johann Lamont*
S3M-1673 Congratulations to Allied Vehicles Ltd (lodged on 4 April 2008) Jack McConnell*
